TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示将用于处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>类为控件上发生的两个事件定义处理程序委托 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> ： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> 事件和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> 事件。 处理事件的方法 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> 是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> 方法。 处理事件的方法 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> 是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> 方法。 在这两种情况下，事件数据都包含在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> 对象中。
